.class nested public auto ansi sealed StreamingSubscriptionConnection/SubscriptionErrorDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub StreamingSubscriptionConnection.SubscriptionErrorDelegate(sender As Object, args As SubscriptionErrorEventArgs)
public: delegate void StreamingSubscriptionConnection::SubscriptionErrorDelegate(System::Object ^ sender, SubscriptionErrorEventArgs ^ args);

Docs.param: The instance within which the error occurred.
Docs.summary: Represents a delegate that is invoked when an error occurs within a streaming subscription connection.
